alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Madison, Franklin, south central Carroll, Crawford, northeastern Sebastian and southern Washington Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Winslow, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Ozark... Huntsville... Mountainburg... Alma... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Mulberry... Greenland... Dyer... Altus... Winslow... Denning... Chester... St. Paul... Rudy... Wiederkehr Village... Wesley... Saint Paul... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 10 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
